sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from '@gatsbyjs/reach-router'; import Logo from '../../components/logo'; import Icon from '../../components/icon'; import { gettext, siteRoot, enableSubscription, enableMultiADFS } from '../../utils/constants'; const propTypes = { isSidePanelClosed: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, onCloseSidePanel: PropTypes.func.isRequired, currentTab: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tabItemClick: PropTypes.func.isRequired }; class SidePanel extends React.Component { getActiveClass = (tab) => { return this.props.currentTab == tab ? 'active' : ''; }; tabItemClick = (tab) => { this.props.tabItemClick(tab); }; render() { return (

{gettext('Admin')}

  • this.tabItemClick('info')} > {gettext('Info')}
  • this.tabItemClick('statistics-admin')} > {gettext('Statistic')}
  • this.tabItemClick('deviceadmin')} > {gettext('Devices')}
  • this.tabItemClick('web-settings')} > {gettext('Settings')}
  • this.tabItemClick('repoadmin')} > {gettext('Libraries')}
  • this.tabItemClick('users')} > {gettext('Users')}
  • this.tabItemClick('groupadmin')}> {gettext('Groups')}
  • this.tabItemClick('departmentadmin')} > {gettext('Departments')}
    • {enableSubscription &&
  • this.tabItemClick('subscription')} > {'付费管理'}
    • }
  • this.tabItemClick('publinkadmin')} > {gettext('Links')}
  • this.tabItemClick('logadmin')} > {gettext('Logs')}
    • {enableMultiADFS &&
  • this.tabItemClick('SAML config')} > {gettext('SAML config')}
    • }
); } } SidePanel.propTypes = propTypes; export default SidePanel;
